description:
Nendo`s friends get mistaken for bullies. Kusuo escapes his friends before their plans to have an escape room adventure become reality.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Bully Rescue! Mr. Iguchi / Suddenly Begins! Real Real Escape Room / Spending the Weekend with Best Friends / Toritsuka vs. Satou! Love Contest! (First Volume) / Toritsuka vs. Satou! Fighting over Rights to Date! (Second Volume)

Ijime Kyuusai! Iguchi-sensei / Totsujokaisai! Real Real Gata Dasshutsu Game / Kyuujitsu wa Uma ga Au Nakama to / Toritsuka Versus Satou! Kousaikensou Dassen! (Zenpen) / Toritsuka Versus Satou! Kousaikensou Dassen! (Kouhen)
イジメ救Ψ! 井口先生 / 突如開Ψ! リアルリアル型脱出ゲーム / 休日はウマが合う仲間と / 鳥束VS[バーサス]佐藤! 交Ψ権争奪戦! (前編) / 鳥束VS[バーサス]佐藤! 交Ψ権争奪戦! (後編)
왕따를 막아라! 이구치 선생님 / 갑작스러운 개최! 리얼 리얼 탈출 게임 / 휴일은 마음이 맞는 친구와 함께 / 토리츠카 VS 사토! 사랑 쟁탈전! (전편) / 토리츠카 VS 사토! 사랑 쟁탈전! (후편)
